abstracts.cdata!:
The project's objectives are to
            improve the capabilities of CWA management and staff, the
            efficiency of CWA's operations, and the quality of
            service to consumers, and to reduce unaccounted-for water.
            The project would improve and expand water supply facilities
            in the Mare-aux-Vacoas, Triolet and Mt. Blanc areas and in
            62 housing estates scattered over the island. It would also
            include a training component and supply of spare parts and
            equipment for the CWA. The project would satisfy the water
            supply demand in the project areas. Combined with the
            project financed by the Kuwait and Abu Dhabi Funds in the
            Mare-aux-Vacoas area, it would provide safe water
            improvement of service to about 446,000 consumers.
